page.title: 02St Annes - Changes.
page.content: First year pupils interviewed grandparents or elderly neighbours for changes in the area.Some of the changes commented on change of use of some of the large houses on the Drive to hotels or apartments.The Palace Cinema is now a shopping arcade an even more recent change a three studio cinema to one cinema & bingo hall.Many small family businesses have been replaced by larger concerns.The job centre was once a Penny Bazaar and Boot's car park a bowling green.Farms on Blackpool Old Road replaced by flats and bungalows.Some playing fields have been built on.Along the front Granny's Bay once sand-dunes is now grassed.Tankers would be seen sailing to Preston Docks (now closed) and dredgers confined the River Ribble in the attempt to master struggles for supremacy between drifting sands & sea
